xxl.core.cursors.sources
Class SingleObjectCursor<E>

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.cursors.AbstractCursor<E>
      xxl.core.cursors.sources.Repeater<E>
          xxl.core.cursors.sources.SingleObjectCursor<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of the elements returned by this iteration.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<E>, Cursor<E>
public class SingleObjectCursor<E>
extends Repeater<E>

This class provides a cursor that returns a given object exactly one time. It simply depends on a repeater that's number of repeating times is set to 1.
